resources.string: Last night of Dana
Use earphones for a better experience
"Start "
You are Dana, a young wealthy lady whose father is the lord of the county
You have always lived very protected, but you know that an important fate awaits you
Dana
Art by:\nSara Piñeiro
Programmed by:\nRubén Montero
Maid:\nGood morning, milady. Wake up.
Maid:\nTonight the feast convoked by your father will\ntake place.
You:\nToday?
Maid:\nYes, it is. A lot of people will assist.
Maid:\nAnd now, please, dress up. Lord Haymitch has\ncome and wants to see you.
Maid:\nThat young man has been watching over you a\nlot recently.
You:\nLord Haymitch wants to see me? Now?
Maid:\nYes.
See him
Avoid him
You:\nI will go outside as soon as possible.
Maid:\nSure, milady.
You:\nI don\'t want to see Lord Haymitch now.
You:\nPlease, tell him to go away.
Maid:\nI will tell him.
You:\nI should not sleep so much.
You:\nI must wake up and go to the town.
Wake up
Sleep
You:\nI prefer to stay in bed.
You:\nZzz...
You:\nI will dress up and go outside.
You:\nNice to see you, lord Haymitch.
Haymitch:\nNice to see you, lady Dana.
